content: Generally, it seems like there are many more apps that support reading/importing SHCs containing Immunizations than lab results. What verifiers/wallets support reading lab results in SHCs?
I am not aware of any...would love to know if there are some out there
We do support them but don't have built out the proper SNOMED support

@Pascal Pfiffner , thank you! I know that your application supports the .smart-health-card file import, and I think the FHIR operation, does it also supporting scanning a QR code to ingest a lab result SHC?
Yes, QR code scanning is supported but only for non-multi-QR codes at this time.
CommonHealth supports SHC lab results as well. :)
Hey @JP Pollak, CommonHealth supports lab results in an SHC, but I think that SMART Health Card Verifier doesn't. Are there plans to add support for SHC lab results in the verifier application?
hey, yes- i don't have a timeline for this but test results is one of the next things i'd like to see addressed
Hi Friend, wanted to revise this thread to see what had changed. Are there verifier apps that support reading test results? It seems like this is a feature more important than ever.
